title: ONE PIECE BROKE ME AGAINðŸ˜­ GOODBYE GOING MERRY! One Piece Episode 310, 311 & 312 REACTION!!
creator: Unknown
description: Reaction video covering episodes 310-312, the Going Merry's return and farewell sequence. The reactor experiences the emotional impact of these episodes.

title: LUFFY DEFEATS LUCCI!! GOING MERRY RETURNS!? - One Piece Episode 309 & 310 REACTION + REVIEW!
creator: Unknown
description: Reaction and review video covering episodes 309 and 310, including Luffy's victory over Rob Lucci and the Going Merry's miraculous return.

title: One Piece: Episode 310
creator: animemiz
description: Contemporary blog review of Episode 310 from when it originally aired. The blogger watched the episode but noted it wasn't as impactful as episode 309.

title: It's Been 18 Years Since One Piece Fans Said Farewell to the Best Ship
creator: ComicBook.com Staff
description: Retrospective article commemorating the 18th anniversary of the Going Merry's farewell in Episode 312. Discusses how the Going Merry's death was voted the most beloved moment in One Piece in the anime's 25th anniversary poll.

title: One Piece Episodes: 310-314 He Stopped Drawing the Deer
creator: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: Podcast episode reviewing One Piece episodes 310-314, covering the Going Merry's return and farewell sequence.

title: Farewell Going Merry: Episode of Heartbreak
creator: episode.name
description: Analysis article discussing the Going Merry farewell sequence, highlighting the poignant Viking funeral and the crew's deep connection to their vessel.

title: Episode of Merry: The Tale of One More Friend
creator: Toei Animation
description: A TV Special that chronicles the Straw Hat Crew's first ship Going Merry recreated with brand-new animation. This special was made available on the official One Piece YouTube channel in 2023 as part of Film: Red celebrations.
